item.title: Abandoned car, 4th October
item.description:
This abandoned car - located along the garden wall of 42 Raymere Gardens, has not moved for at least six months or longer. The MOT ran out on the 1st October 2024. Tax ran out 1st October 2025. It has been sitting there so long, the steering wheel has green mould on it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Raymere Gardens, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
